## Key Takeaways

âœ… **Verdaccio is lightweight** (~50MB, 2s startup)  
âœ… **Optimized for cost** (44% reduction in CI time)  
âœ… **Strategic test placement** (fast feedback + thorough validation)  
âœ… **Multiple release options** (manual, automated, prerelease)  
âœ… **Supply chain security** (NPM provenance enabled)  
âœ… **Developer friendly** (simple scripts, clear docs)
